data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The more populous northern part of the country, comprising about 30% of the country's total area, is called the Swiss Plateau. It ____ greater ____ and ____ landscapes, partly ____, ____ open ____, ____ with ____ herds, or ____ and ____ fields, but ____ is ____ hilly. There are large lakes found here and the biggest Swiss cities are in this area of the country.
data.partBlankContent: The more populous northern part of the country, comprising about 30% of the country's total area, is called the Swiss Plateau. It h__ greater op__ and hi___ landscapes, partly fore____, par___ open past____, usu____ with gra____ herds, or veget_____ and fr___ fields, but i_ is st___ hilly. There are large lakes found here and the biggest Swiss cities are in this area of the country.
data.answer: 人口较多的北部地区，约占全国总面积的30%，被称为瑞士高原。它有更大的开放和丘陵景观，部分森林，部分开放的牧场，通常有放牧的牛群，或蔬菜和水果田，但它仍然是丘陵。这里有很多大湖，瑞士最大的城市都在这个地区。
